captions.text:
- I wish you took a
picture and sent it to me.
- He has a good job, he was super deep,

- He was kind of like
the strong, serious type.

- Was he deep or was he
kinda standoffish and dicky
and now you want the challenge?

- Is that the guy that has
the really weird brother
- No, he's the one who invited me his spa.
- What if when we're older and badass,
- What would we do? Can that happen?
- The our kids would be related!

- Oh my God, so then we
would technically be related.

- We're doing that. We
need to only date brothers.

- Speaking of that, Becky's
actually been to Chicago

and she knows how to
make Chicago-style pizza.
- He's saying by June he's going to start
and I'm definitely in the running.

- Oh my God, Missy, wait,
why didn't I know that?
- No, I just forgot to tell you.

- You've got to tell me
these things, sweetie.
- So bloaty and fat right now.
- Okay. First of all, you are not fat.
But I know you feel that way so I'm sorry.

Second of all, even if
you were a little bloated,
no one can tell in this outfit.
And third, your ass looks fantastic
